00012 #include <pob-eye.h>
00013 
00014 //Function to initialize the POB-PROTO board
00015 void InitPobProto (void)
00016 {
00017         // struct to set the pob-proto
00018         PobProto        Proto; 
00019 
00020         //to get the position of the analogic joystick, you have to set the PORTA as analogic input
00021         Proto.porta=ALL_PORTA_AS_ANA;   
00022 
00023         //all pin of PORTC are configured to manage servomotors
00024         Proto.portc=RC7_AS_SERVO        | RC6_AS_SERVO |RC3_AS_SERVO |RC2_AS_SERVO|RC1_AS_SERVO |RC0_AS_SERVO;  
00025 
00026         //RD0 RD1 RD2 RD3 are configured as digitals output to gear DC motor, RD4 RD5 RD6 RD7 are configured as digitals input
00027         Proto.portd=RD7_AS_DI   | RD6_AS_DI     |RD5_AS_DI |RD4_AS_DI|RD3_AS_DO |RD2_AS_DO      |RD1_AS_DO      |RD0_AS_DO;             
00028         
00029         //set the pob proto
00030         SetPobProto(&Proto);    
00031 }
00032 
00033 int main(void)
00034 {
00035         //init POB-EYE
00036         InitPobeye2();
00037 
00038         //pob-proto init
00039         InitPobProto();
00040 
00041         return 0;
00042 }
